results.content: The content is a bit unstructured, but otherwise this is the best Drupal course I've seen so far.

results.content: Lack of offline documents, the narrator is too fast and supported doc are not included, not for every level students, need to know oop PHP programming so far you can fetch many basic fundamentals of Drupal 8. Thanks for creating this course.
results.content_html: Lack of offline documents, the narrator is too fast and supported doc are not included, not for every level students, need to know oop PHP programming so far you can fetch many basic fundamentals of Drupal 8. Thanks for creating this course.

results.content: In Section 1 very good but section 2, it too tightens content and too fast hard to understand. it will good if show real an example.
results.content_html: In Section 1 very good but section 2, it too tightens content and too fast hard to understand. it will good if show real an example.

results.content: The first part is just a superficial intro to Drupal - great for a newcomer to Drupal, but not for a seasoned developer. The second part flips the plot and runs through difficult and advanced concepts without a hint of development. The files available in the creator's GitHub repository are outdated and problematic to import.
results.content_html: The first part is just a superficial intro to Drupal - great for a newcomer to Drupal, but not for a seasoned developer. The second part flips the plot and runs through difficult and advanced concepts without a hint of development. The files available in the creator's GitHub repository are outdated and problematic to import.

results.content: I am super upset with the money I spent for such a tutorial. Actually it's only walking through the drupal for beginners. Which I already found much better resources on Youtube for free.
